entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
